title: Fix Unused 'Icon' in ReportsPage.jsx
description: Resolve the linting error where 'Icon' is reported as unused despite being used as a component. This often happens if the linter is confused by renaming in destructuring or if there's a typo.

steps.description: Rename 'icon: Icon' to 'icon: IconComponent' and use it accordingly.
steps.command: python -c "import sys; content = open(r'c:\Users\Abdulrahman\Desktop\IMS\somali-pos-system\frontend\src\pages\ReportsPage.jsx', 'r', encoding='utf-8').read(); content = content.replace('icon: Icon, color', 'icon: IconComponent, color').replace('<Icon size={24} />', '<IconComponent size={24} />'); open(r'c:\Users\Abdulrahman\Desktop\IMS\somali-pos-system\frontend\src\pages\ReportsPage.jsx', 'w', encoding='utf-8').write(content)"
